mapper.sql: no, customerNo, loginId, loginPass, salt, division, loginStatus, canLogin, deleteFlg, addTimestamp, addUserKey, updTimestamp, updUserKey, updPgmId

a.no, a.customerNo, a.loginId, a.division as customerType, case when b.cnSurName is not null then concat(b.cnSurName, b.cnGivenName) when c.cnName is not null then c.cnName end as customerName, DATE_FORMAT(a.addTimestamp,'%Y/%m/%d') as registDate
mapper.select:
select
from t_customer_login_info a left join t_individual_basic_info b on a.customerNo = b.customerNo left join t_enterprise_basic_info c on a.customerNo = c.customerNo
and concat(b.cnSurName, b.cnGivenName) like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or c.cnName like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and concat(b.cnSurName, b.cnGivenName) like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or c.cnName like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and c.cnName like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

select count(1) from t_customer_login_info a left join t_individual_basic_info b on a.customerNo = b.customerNo left join t_enterprise_basic_info c on a.customerNo = c.customerNo
and concat(b.cnSurName, b.cnGivenName) like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or c.cnName like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and concat(b.cnSurName, b.cnGivenName) like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%' or c.cnName like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
and c.cnName like '%' || #{customerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into t_customer_login_info (no, customerNo, loginId, loginPass, salt, loginStatus, canLogin, deleteFlg, addTimestamp, addUserKey, updTimestamp, updUserKey, updPgmId) values (#{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{canLogin,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_customer_login_info
customerNo = #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginId = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginPass = #{loginPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
loginStatus = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
canLogin = #{canLogin,jdbcType=CHAR},
deleteFlg = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=CHAR},
addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_customer_login_info set customerNo = #{customerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginId = #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginPass = #{loginPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, loginStatus = #{loginStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, canLogin = #{canLogin,jdbcType=CHAR}, deleteFlg = #{deleteFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, addTimestamp = #{addtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, addUserKey = #{adduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updTimestamp = #{updtimestamp,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updUserKey = #{upduserkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updPgmId = #{updpgmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where no = #{no,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.customerNo ,a.loginId ,a.loginPass ,a.salt ,a.loginStatus ,a.canLogin from t_customer_login_info a inner join t_customer_security_info b on a.customerNo = b.customerNo where (b.telNo = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.emailAddr = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or b.wechatNo = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) and a.loginPass = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.deleteFlg = '0'
